Title: Provides that all members of the board of regents shall be elected by concurrent resolution of the legislature on the second Tuesday of March
Summary: Provides that all members of the board of regents shall be elected by concurrent resolution of the legislature on the second Tuesday of March, regardless if such election is to fill the expired term of a regent or to fill the unexpired term of a regent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to election of the members of the board of regents
